properties.description:
Enter any relevant descriptive information.

Please ensure that the descriptive information pertains to the digitized object specifically and not a larger work/collection/exhibition, as the context for the record will change over time.
properties.title: Abstract

properties.default_value: A. G. "Dutch" and Margaret Ann Roth Papers

properties.description:
This is the display/human-readable form of the date. Date may be entered in structured form, e.g., 1935-07-09 or textual form, e.g., July 9th, 1935. Use circa, approximately, or other appropriate term, when the date is uncertain, e.g., circa 1945. Repeat if transcription/translated/transliteration needed.

Pulled from finding aid information. If slide itself have a more specific date, use that instead of the finding aid date.
properties.title: Date

properties.default_value: A. G. "Dutch" and Margaret Ann Roth Papers

properties.description: Enter any relevant information that should be publicly viewable but that does not belong in any of the other fields.
properties.title: Public Note

properties.default_value: University of Tennessee, Knoxville. Special Collections

create.value: <accessCondition type="local rights statement">The copyright interests in this item remain with the creator. For more information, contact Special Collections at special@utk.edu.</accessCondition>

properties.description: Press "Add" to add another geographic subject.
properties.title: Subject - Geographic

properties.description: If not local, list authority. (e.g. LCNAF)
properties.title: Authority

properties.description: If not local, list value URI. (e.g. http://id.loc.gov/authorities/names/no97050439.html)
properties.title: Value URI

properties.description: Press "Add" to add another name subject.

properties.description: If not local, list authority. (e.g. LCNAF)

properties.description: If not local, list value URI. (e.g. http://id.loc.gov/authorities/names/no97050439.html)
properties.title: Value URI

properties.description: Press "Add" to add another topic subject.
